meanings.sent1: The remote cabin was unelectrified, so they used lanterns for light.
meanings.sent2: The unelectrified village relied on candles for illumination.
meanings.sent3: The unelectrified house felt like a step back in time, with its old-fashioned oil lamps.
meanings.sent4: In the unelectrified room, the darkness enveloped everything like a heavy blanket.
meanings.sent5: Living in an unelectrified area made them appreciate the simplicity of life without constant power.

meanings.sent1: The unelectrified device needed batteries to function.
meanings.sent2: The unelectrified machine remained silent and inactive.
meanings.sent3: Trying to use the unelectrified gadget was like trying to start a car without fuel.
meanings.sent4: His unelectrified tools were useless in the modern workshop.
meanings.sent5: The unelectrified appliance seemed out of place in the high-tech kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The unelectrified building had no outlets for plugging in devices.
meanings.sent2: The unelectrified room had no light switches on the walls.
meanings.sent3: Living in an unelectrified house meant getting creative with manual chores.
meanings.sent4: The unelectrified office felt disconnected from the digital world.
meanings.sent5: The unelectrified area was a reminder of simpler times when technology was scarce.
